text: The Talk is an American talk show. It debuted on October 18, 2010, as part of CBS' daytime programming block. It was developed by actress and host Sara Gilbert. It featured Sheryl Underwood, Amanda Kloots, Jerry O'Connell, Akbar Gbajabiamila, and Natalie Morales. On April 12, 2024, it was announced that the series would end after 15 seasons. The show aired its final episode on December 20, 2024. title: The Talk (talk show)
